summary.sectionSubtitle: A collection of quotes to inspire and guide your practice.
summary.sectionText: Mindfulness is a core component of Dialectical Behavior Therapy (DBT), emphasizing non-judgmental awareness of the present moment to foster self-compassion and emotional balance.

quotes.text: Mindfulness isn't difficult. We just need to remember to do it.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.text: Wherever you go, there you are.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.text: The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: Feelings come and go like clouds in a windy sky. Conscious breathing is my anchor.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: In today's rush, we all think too much — seek too much — want too much — and forget about the joy of just being.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.text: The little things? The little moments? They aren't little.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.text: Pain is inevitable, suffering is optional.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami
